Key Match Events: David Miller and Aiden Markram stitched a 74-run partnership
Arshdeep Singh picked up the big wickets of Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw
Mohammed Shami nipped out South Africa's out-of-form captain Temba Bavuma
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma conceded that the Men in Blue were not up to the mark on the field
Rohit Sharma defended the move to give R Ashwin the 18th over
Miscellaneous Highlights: India lost their first match of Super 12 in T20 World Cup 2022
India will be hoping to bounce back when they take on Bangladesh in their penultimate Super 12 match in Adelaide on Wednesday
Others: Virat Kohli dropped a catch in India's loss to South Africa
Rohit Sharma missed a run-out opportunity as India lost by 5 wickets
India are at the 2nd spot in the Group 2 Super 12 points table
